Production Co: Wild Swim Films, Gingerbread Pictures, A24, BFI Films, Cinereach, BBC Film, Record Player Films

Synopsis: A mother (Julia Louis-Dreyfus, in a profoundly moving performance) and her teenage daughter (Lola Petticrew) must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird. From debut filmmaker Daina O. PusiÄ‡, Tuesday is a heart-rending fairy tale about the echoes of loss and finding resilience in the unexpected.
Title: Tuesday
